page.title: 08Hobbies in Wool
page.content: There are football and cricket teams who play in local league matches. The British Legion has both women's and men's darts and skittles teams. There are some keen golfers in the community. A flourishing Operatic and Drama Group, known as "The D'Urbervilles" perform an opera and play every year.The W.I.has a Ramblers group who meet fortnightly throughout the year to explore the Purbeck area. Evening classes may be attended through the winter,and many subjects are studied. Painting,pottery,embroidery,lace making,crochet,flower arranging, ,home decorating,piano playing,gardening spinning and weaving are all enjoyed by many local people. Hobbies, such as pebble painting and cooking are quite lucrative when the products are sold.
